Entries.default: "Can we pet it now? Do we want to?"
"Did that overgrown mushroom just speak with you? Huh, wonders never cease."
"Have a nice trip? Next time you talk to some shrooms, bring enough for the rest of the crew."
"I hope that you understood more of that than I did, Watcher."
"Never chatted up a dank spore before. Suppose it were bound to happen eventually."
"So, like, that mean they ain't gonna keep spitting their little spores at us?"
"How do I know it's still you, and not a fungus facsimile?"
"What'd it say, Watcher? Did it present you with a morel dilemma?"
"You would be wise to mistrust it, captain. Its mind is... not simple."
"I hope you know what you're doing. I have never met an honest mold."
"Postenago! Don't make puns about things you don't understand!"
"What'd it say, Watcher? Did it present you with a morel dilemma?"
"Aw, you don't have mushroom in your heart for my jokes?"
"Get it out of your system, then."
